# Frontend

## Project name

netflix-streaming-app

## Plan

A Netflix-inspired streaming platform with a public landing page featuring an auto-playing hero video and authentication prompts. After signup and Stripe subscription, users access a protected video library with a dark, immersive UI. The app includes smooth transitions, hover effects on video thumbnails, a full-screen video player, and an account management section for subscription and profile settings.

## Additional notes

- **Landing page (page.tsx)**: Auto-playing hero video with CTA buttons for signup/login
- **Library page (library/page.tsx)**: Protected route displaying video grid with categories, requires active subscription
- **Watch page (watch/page.tsx)**: Full-screen video player with controls and video metadata
- **Account page (account/page.tsx)**: Display subscription status, manage profile, cancel subscription option
- **Stripe Integration**: Handle subscription creation on signup, webhook for subscription status updates
- **Authentication Flow**: Supabase Auth for login/signup, redirect to Stripe checkout, verify subscription status before library access
- **Video Storage**: Store video files and thumbnails in Supabase Storage, reference URLs in videos table
- **Dark Theme**: Netflix-style black/dark gray color scheme with red accent colors
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach with grid layouts adapting to screen sizes
